Override.locationdescription.destroyedstation: A recently destroyed station. Its entrance is inaccessible by submarines. It is impossible to dock here.
Override.locationdescription.starteroutpost:
These old elevator shafts ferry personel and resources all the way through the crust of Europa to the icy depths below. It is the unavoidable starting point for any would-be submariner.
Offers: -Missions -Crew for Hire -Shops: General Goods
Override.locationdescription.outpost:
A small, newly established civilian outpost.
Offers: -Missions
Override.locationdescription.settlement:
A growing civilian outpost.
Offers: -Missions -Crew for Hire -Fabrication -Shops: General Goods
Override.locationdescription.colony:
A developed civilian outpost.
Offers: -Missions -Crew for Hire -Fabrication -Upgrades -Shops: General Goods
Override.locationdescription.city:
A landmark of Europan colonization, bustling with activity.
Offers the largest variety of stores and services
Override.locationdescription.camp:
A small military encampment.
Offers: -Missions -Crew for Hire
Override.locationdescription.base:
A medium-sized military base.
Offers: -Missions -Crew for Hire -Fabrication -Shops: Armory
Override.locationdescription.military:
A large military stronghold.
Offers: -Missions -Crew for Hire -Fabrication -Submarines -Upgrades -Shops: Military, Engineering Supplies
Override.locationdescription.blockade:
Military fortification blocking off access to deeper areas.
Offers: -Missions -Medical Doctor -Shops: Armory
Override.locationdescription.militaryforces:
A military submarine fighting off enemy monsters in the area.
Offers: -Missions -Medical Doctor -Shops: Armory
Override.locationdescription.clinic:
A small medical outpost for treating injuries.
Offers: -Missions -Doctor
Override.locationdescription.hospital:
A large medical outpost with doctors and medical supplies
Offers: -Missions -Crew for Hire -Doctor -Fabrication -Shops: Medical
Override.locationdescription.hydroponics:
An agricultural station for growing plants and feeding hungry Europans.
Offers: -Missions -Crew for Hire -Food
Override.locationdescription.construction:
A construction site working on a new type of station.
Offers: -Missions -Fabrication
Override.locationdescription.factory:
A production center, making and distributing all sorts of goods.
Offers: -Missions -Crew for Hire -Fabrication -Upgrades -Shops: General Goods, Minerals
Override.locationdescription.shipyard:
A large industrial site, equipped to build submarines.
Offers: -Missions -Crew for Hire -Fabrication -Submarines -Upgrades -Shops: General Goods, Engineering Supplies
Override.locationdescription.survey:
A small automated module scanning the surrounding area for minerals.
Offers mining missions
Override.locationdescription.mine:
A mining operation exploiting pockets of dry caves for minerals.
Offers: -Fabrication -Shops: Minerals
Override.locationdescription.study:
A small research center.
Offers: -Missions -Research Labs -Shops: Research.
Override.locationdescription.research:
A deep-sea research complex.
Offers: -Missions -Crew for Hire -Fabrication -Research Labs -Submarines -Shops: Research.
Override.locationdescription.pirateoutpost:
A safe haven where pirates trade their ill-gotten goods. Hates the coalition.
Offers: -Missions -Crew for Hire -Medical Doctor -Submarines -Upgrades -Shops: General Goods, Pharmacy, Electronics, Armory
Override.locationdescription.huskchurch:
A temple belonging the Church of Husk, specialized in research, medicine and worship.
Offers: -Missions -Crew for Hire -Doctor -Fabrication -Shops: Research, Medical.
Override.locationdescription.sinkingcircus: Entertainers, travelling the cold seas of Europa.
Override.locationdescription.Lair: Local fauna has nested deep inside a cave and is using it as breeding grounds.
Override.locationdescription.outerlair: An area infested with monsters due to the presence of a nearby lair.
Override.locationdescription.HuskgroundsDE: A hotspot of fauna infected with the husk parasite spreading rapidly.
Override.locationdescription.outerhusklair: Swarms of husk infected monsters are spreading from a nearby infected lair.
Override.locationdescription.PirateNone: Pirates are taking apart the abandoned outpost to build a new haven from its pieces.
Override.locationchange.destroyedstation.changeto: Movement was detected near the remnants of [name].
Override.locationchange.circus.changeto.none: The Sinking Circus has left the area.
Override.locationchange.none.changeto.circus: The Sinking Circus has arrived in [previousname].
Override.locationchange.UnderAttack.changeto.mili: Military Forces have been seen moving into [previousname].
Override.locationchange.militaryforces.changeto.N: Military Forces have left the area.
Override.locationchange.PirateOutpost.changeto.Un: The pirates of [previousname] have been eradicated.
[previousname] has been freed from the pirates.
Override.locationchange.construction.changeto.non: Construction work at [name] was stopped due to nearby dangers.
Ongoing constructions at [name] were abandoned due to nearby dangers.
The construction site at [name] was closed down and abandoned due to nearby dangers.
Override.locationchange.construction.changeto.set: The constructions of a new settlement at [previousname] are now concluded. More settlers are moving into their new homes.
Override.locationchange.survey.changeto.extractio: Surveys at [previousname] found a mineral deposit and workers are now beginning the excavation.
Override.locationchange.hydroponics.changeto.bios: The hydroponics at [previousname] upgraded their facilities into a biosphere to provide enough meat for local stations.
Override.locationchange.abandoned.changeto.pirate: Pirates are taking apart the abandoned outpost and build a new haven from its pieces.
Override.locationchange.biosphere.changeto.nouris: The biosphere of [previousname] was successfully upgraded to a nourishment facility.
Override.locationchange.study.changeto.lab: Studies at [previousname] were concluded and the facility was upgraded to research laboratories.
Override.locationchange.settlement.changeto.outpo: The Colonists at [previousname] have expanded the colony to hold more people.
Override.locationchange.lab.changeto.research: More researchers are drawn towards [previousname] and are founding an institute.
Override.locationchange.excavation.changeto.mine: Excavation at [previousname] has finished and workers are now starting a mine.
Override.locationchange.hospital.changeto.surgery: The hospital of [previousname] was successfully upgraded to a surgery center.
Override.locationchange.clinic.changeto.hospital: The clinic of [previousname] was in need for more capacity so they upgraded it into a hospital.
Override.locationchange.outpost.changeto.abandone: We have lost contact with [previousname] unexpectedly. We advise you to investigate with caution.
The beacon station nearby [previousname] recieved an automated SOS broadcast from the station, but no further communication has been recieved.
Reports at [previousname] indicate hostiles have overrun the outpost. No survivors have been found.
Reports at [previousname] indicate hostiles have overrun the outpost. Survivors are being extracted via shuttle.
Override.locationchange.none.changeto.waypoint: [previousname] has a good chunk of space to set up an outpost.
The Coalition has marked [previousname] as a good location to colonize.
Override.locationchange.none.changeto.Huskswarm: Swarms of husk-infected monsters were spotted around [previousname].
Override.locationchange.colony.changeto.settlemen: The Colonists at [previousname] have expanded the colony to hold more people.
Override.locationchange.colony.changeto.construct: The Colonists at [previousname] have started construction on the station.
The Colonists at [previousname] have started working on making amenities.
Override.locationchange.construction.changeto.hyd: The Engineers at [previousname] have finished wiring the hydroponics bay.
The Mechanics at [previousname] have finished welding on a hydroponics bay.
[previousname] is now growing crops for the surrounding area.
Override.locationchange.construction.changeto.fac: The Engineers at [previousname] have finished setting up the fabricators.
The Mechanics at [previousname] have started production on consumer goods.
Override.locationchange.construction.changeto.cam: Coalition Security Forces have started setting up a base at [previousname].
[previousname] is being controlled by the coalition.
A Coalition camp is being set up at [previousname].
Override.locationchange.construction.changeto.stu: A study of the area around [previousname] showed there is lots of exotic life in the region.
[previousname] noticed a facinating floral specimen growing in the cavern.
Override.locationchange.construction.changeto.sur: A survey of the area around [previousname] showed that valuable ore is present.
Override.locationchange.construction.changeto.fus: Engineers and Scientists at [previousname] have finished the fusion power plant.
[previousname] now provides fusion power to the surrounding area.
The cooling turbine for the fusion power plant at [previousname] is complete.
Override.locationchange.construction.changeto.shi: Engineers and Mechanics at [previousname] have started selling ship and ship parts.
The Shipyard at [previousname] has finished construction.
Override.locationchange.construction.changeto.cli: Medical Treatment is now available at [previousname].
[previousname] has set up a small infirmary.
A clinic has finished being built at [previousname].
Override.locationchange.base.changeto.military: Coalition Forces have set up an massive fortress at [previousname].
Coalition Forces are mobilizing out of [previousname].
[previousname] has become a fortress to defend nearby stations.
Coalition Forces have set up an massive fortress at [previousname].
Coalition Forces are mobilizing out of [previousname].
[previousname] has become a fortress to defend nearby stations.
Override.locationchange.none.changeto.pirateoutpo: Pirates established a new haven at [previousname].
Pirates ventured into [previousname] and established a new haven.
Override.locationchange.none.changeto.huskchurch: Chuch of Husk missionaries have baptized the new [name].
Override.locationchange.StarterOutpostSPAWN.chang: The docking area at [name] is servicing other submarines and is inaccessible for the moment.
